title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 104 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 104 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: Bless the LORD, O my soul. O LORD my God, thou art very great; thou art clothed with honour and majesty.
lineList.cn: 我的心哪，你要称颂耶和华。耶和华我的神阿，你为至大。你以尊荣威严为衣服。

lineList.en: Who coverest thyself with light as with a garment: who stretchest out the heavens like a curtain:
lineList.cn: 披上亮光，如披外袍，铺张穹苍，如铺幔子。

lineList.en: Who layeth the beams of his chambers in the waters: who maketh the clouds his chariot: who walketh upon the wings of the wind:
lineList.cn: 在水中立楼阁的楝梁，用云彩为车辇，藉着风的翅膀而行。

lineList.en: Who maketh his angels spirits; his ministers a flaming fire:
lineList.cn: 以风为使者，以火焰为仆役。

lineList.en: Who laid the foundations of the earth, that it should not be removed for ever.
lineList.cn: 将地立在根基上，使地永不动摇。

lineList.en: Thou coveredst it with the deep as with a garment: the waters stood above the mountains.
lineList.cn: 你用深水遮盖地面，犹如衣裳。诸水高过山岭。

lineList.en: At thy rebuke they fled; at the voice of thy thunder they hasted away.
lineList.cn: 你的斥责一发，水便奔逃。你的雷声一发，水便奔流。

lineList.en: They go up by the mountains; they go down by the valleys unto the place which thou hast founded for them.
lineList.cn: （诸山升上，诸谷沉下（或作随山上翻，随谷下流），归你为它所安定之地

lineList.en: Thou hast set a bound that they may not pass over; that they turn not again to cover the earth.
lineList.cn: 你定了界限，使水不能过去，不再转回遮盖地面。

lineList.en: He sendeth the springs into the valleys, which run among the hills.
lineList.cn: 耶和华使泉源涌在山谷，流在山间。

lineList.en: They give drink to every beast of the field: the wild asses quench their thirst.
lineList.cn: 使野地的走兽有水喝，野驴得解其渴。

lineList.en: By them shall the fowls of the heaven have their habitation, which sing among the branches.
lineList.cn: 天上的飞鸟在水旁住宿，在树枝上啼叫。

lineList.en: He watereth the hills from his chambers: the earth is satisfied with the fruit of thy works.
lineList.cn: 他从楼阁中浇灌山岭。因他作为的功效，地就丰足。

lineList.en: He causeth the grass to grow for the cattle, and herb for the service of man: that he may bring forth food out of the earth;
lineList.cn: 他使草生长，给六畜吃。使菜蔬发长，供给人用。使人从地里能得食物。

lineList.en: And wine that maketh glad the heart of man, and oil to make his face to shine, and bread which strengtheneth man's heart.
lineList.cn: 又得酒能悦人心，得油能润人面，得粮能养人心。

lineList.en: The trees of the LORD are full of sap; the cedars of Lebanon, which he hath planted;
lineList.cn: 佳美的树木，就是黎巴嫩蹬香柏树，是耶和华所栽种的，都满了汁浆。

lineList.en: Where the birds make their nests: as for the stork, the fir trees are her house.
lineList.cn: 雀鸟在其上搭窝。至于鹤，松树是它的房屋。

lineList.en: The high hills are a refuge for the wild goats; and the rocks for the conies.
lineList.cn: 高山为野山羊的住所。岩石为沙番的藏处。

lineList.en: He appointed the moon for seasons: the sun knoweth his going down.
lineList.cn: 你安置月亮为定节令。日头自知沉落。

lineList.en: Thou makest darkness, and it is night: wherein all the beasts of the forest do creep forth.
lineList.cn: 你造黑暗为夜，林中的百兽就都爬出来。

lineList.en: The young lions roar after their prey, and seek their meat from God.
lineList.cn: 少壮狮子吼叫，要抓食，向神寻求食物。

lineList.en: The sun ariseth, they gather themselves together, and lay them down in their dens.
lineList.cn: 日头一出，兽便躲避，卧在洞里。

lineList.en: Man goeth forth unto his work and to his labour until the evening.
lineList.cn: 人出去做工，劳碌直到晚上。

lineList.en: O LORD, how manifold are thy works! in wisdom hast thou made them all: the earth is full of thy riches.
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，你所造的何其多，都是你用智慧造成的。遍地满了你的丰富。

lineList.en: So is this great and wide sea, wherein are things creeping innumerable, both small and great beasts.
lineList.cn: 那里有海，又大又广。其中有无数的动物。大小活物都有。

lineList.en: There go the ships: there is that leviathan, whom thou hast made to play therein.
lineList.cn: 那里有船行走。有你所造的鳄鱼游泳在其中。

lineList.en: These wait all upon thee; that thou mayest give them their meat in due season.
lineList.cn: 这都仰望你按时给它食物。

lineList.en: That thou givest them they gather: thou openest thine hand, they are filled with good.
lineList.cn: 你给它们，它们便拾起来；你张手，它们饱得美食。

lineList.en: Thou hidest thy face, they are troubled: thou takest away their breath, they die, and return to their dust.
lineList.cn: 你掩面，它们便惊惶。你收回它们的气，它们就死亡，归于尘土。

lineList.en: Thou sendest forth thy spirit, they are created: and thou renewest the face of the earth.
lineList.cn: 你发出你的灵，它们便受造。你使地面更换为新。

lineList.en: The glory of the LORD shall endure for ever: the LORD shall rejoice in his works.
lineList.cn: 愿耶和华的荣耀存到永远。愿耶和华喜悦自己所造的。

lineList.en: He looketh on the earth, and it trembleth: he toucheth the hills, and they smoke.
lineList.cn: 他看地，地便震动。他摸山，山就冒烟。

lineList.en: I will sing unto the LORD as long as I live: I will sing praise to my God while I have my being.
lineList.cn: 我要一生向耶和华唱诗。我还活的时候，要向我神歌颂。

lineList.en: My meditation of him shall be sweet: I will be glad in the LORD.
lineList.cn: 愿他以我的默念为甘甜。我要因耶和华欢喜。

lineList.en: Let the sinners be consumed out of the earth, and let the wicked be no more. Bless thou the LORD, O my soul. Praise ye the LORD.
lineList.cn: 愿罪人从世上消灭。愿恶人归于无有。我的心哪，要称颂耶和华。你们要赞美耶和华。（原文作哈利路亚下同）
